p: Interior quarantine, on the other hand, is responsible for surveillance of quarantine pests, addressed at the municipal level through the ETPPsâ€™ technicians. This involves inspections of nurseries, seed orchards, research stations with focus on exotic crops, warehouses of processed products, and export areas. Moreover, technicians conduct follow-ups on potential threats recognized by quarantine inspectors at Points of Entry, and emit phytosanitary export certificates.
